content: **2020 update** - pattern now has both a **slouchy** version and a **beanie** version sometimes you just want a quick instant gratification project that you can finish in one evening this hat is just that kind of project if you re pretty fast you can finish it in 2 hours or less i ve probably made about 50 of these hats already but it wasn t until i went to copenhagen on a business trip during the winter that i saw many of the chic copenhagen urbanites rocking similar hats complete with awesome pompoms of course this hat is named after nørrebro the suburb of copenhagen where i saw and semi-stalked for pictures a lady rocking a similar hat **ps ** this hat is also called everyone s hat this name is from a friend of mine who swears that this hat looks great on everyone including her it really is a pretty awesome unisex hat gauge - i haven t really measured gauge for this hat but if you are usually a loose knitter you tend to be even looser when knitting in the round so use the us #9 and #11 for the hat if you are a tight knitter use the us #11 and us #13 for your hat
